thread.title: In the executive lounge check-out
thread.title_full: In the executive lounge check-out - Review of Renaissance Beijing Capital Hotel, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

title: In the executive lounge check-out
text:
Due to business trip to Beijing r&f Renaissance hotel, the geographical position is very good, it's easy to find, the key is the hotel service special enthusiasm, especially executive lounge pearl, very careful when check-out, live very happy
Room Tip: You'd better make the reservation in advance See more room tips
